name: Hilton Mumbai International Airport

reviews.text: This is my first visit since the hotel changed from a Starwood Hotel to a Hilton.
reviews.title: First visit as a Hilton

reviews.text: The hotel has not changed too much. The rooms are very comfortable and everything works. It has a very nice boutique feel, and I like the willing service. I have used the hotel in the past because it provides a nice introduction to India, and to date, I have not come across a guest who has had any trouble adjusting to the food, or any problems after visiting the hotel.
reviews.title: Good spot for waiting for a flight

reviews.text: I did have a problem on this visit that would prevent me from returning, and offer this as a caution to others.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel with poor service and food

reviews.text: The hotel does (now) seem to go out of its way to try to confirm your exact arrival time. I checked in twice, once from Dubai at approx. 4am, the second from Ahmedabad at approx. 8pm.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, close to the airport, atrocious service.

reviews.text: The early morning arrival at 4am was no problem, I had booked the hotel for the night before, and my room was ready immediatley on arrival, as it should have been.
reviews.title: Surely some mistake…

reviews.text: I've noticed that Hilton has been struggling in India ever since I've returned. The first thing about the Hilton lobby is that it's the tiniest I've seen. I don't know where it's four or five stars but it was more akin to a budget hotel..very narrow and unimpressive. Food was average, service was good though they seemed busier than usual. Would rather stay at the Leela, Hyatt Regence or the ITC Grand Maratha instead which also share the same convenience of being close to the International airport (5 mins drive) even if they are a little bit more expensive.
reviews.title: A little overpriced and small, but comfortable and good service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms ok. but the service was indifferent and slow down only to the Imperial China restaurant, the service works. The pool area was dirty (lots of birds).Did not meet expectations from hilton hotel
reviews.title: Lazy service and somewhat stuffy atmosphere

reviews.text: We reached mumbai at midnight. around 1:35 . Took a bit of time to check in.The midnight buffet was great. Especially the indian section was good.It was a very nice stay and the hotel looks very good inside! its worth a dinner and also a stay.ALways a comfort to stay at hilton and find a level of consistency at all of their property worldwide. Checkout was smooth.Will be staying at this property again when i visit in June .
reviews.title: Gorgeous HOtel and a good place to stay.

reviews.text: The choice of Airport Hotels in Mumbai is a little overwhelming - but my general rule of thumb is that you can't go wrong with a Hilton -- and the Mumbai Hilton further proves my point.
reviews.title: Perfect Mumbai Airport Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Located between the Int and Domestic Airport, it makes short layovers very convenient.
reviews.title: WOW! Gorgeous HOtel, Excellent Staff, and amazing room decor!!

reviews.text: Stayed at Hilton for New year's eve. The propertly is convinently located near to the International Terminal. The hotel decor is pretty. Though the hotel is not really spread out and the lobby is pretty small compared to other hotels in similar category, all is well maitained. The rooms were pretty neat, well equipped. Rooms aminities included everything including a small refrigerator. Within the hotel gym and a small pool is available. A reading room and numbers of resturants are at ease of access. Over all I would rate hotel high on the clealiness, ease of access and service.
reviews.title: Good Property near International Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I went to this hotel on 5th may and had informed them earlier that I would be checking in with my wife. They welcomed us with a bouquet. when we entered the room there was a delicious chocolate cake placed on the side table .... Felt really great looking at their attention to detail ... The room was very nice, spacious and artistically done. This Hilton property was earlier the le royal meridian.... so that explains the french styled rooms. beautiful wooden windows... which can be closed for complete privacy... excellent room service...... and ya a very scrumptious complementary breakfast.... The bathroom had a separate tub, and a separate shower area enclosed in glass...... the bed was huge with a roof or whatever you call it over it...... felt like we were sleeping inside a palace..... my only complaint with the hotel is the same as I have with all Indian five star hotels..... Include some more Indian dishes in the Room service menu ...... the view from the room was nothing great .... as lots of construction is going on around it ... maybe its a new hotel coming up..... this hotel feels like a palace ... you even have an art gallery to go and look at if you like art .... feels like you are in a very romantic place ... and ya forgot to mention this hotel is located very close to the international airport ... you can reach the airport in 5 minutes ... overall a great experience ... I would definitely go back there... and recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Mumbai..... its close to the airport and the rooms don't feel like office rooms.
reviews.title: Beautiful interiors ... French Charm

reviews.text: I stayed at the hilton mid-december and the hotel is very well located, near the airport.
reviews.title: Excellent location and good service

reviews.text: A lot of works on the road nearby but it is very quiet inside the premises.
reviews.title: Superb property near international airport

reviews.text: Rooms are very clean and bed extremely comfortable.
reviews.title: Convenient and nice.

reviews.text: ... we have visited Hilton because of our waiting time before our international flight for dinner. ther stuff was very friendly and took our bagguage. we went for dinner and had some relaxed hours in the lobby with live music. even if the prices are international the food at the Brasserie is also... It was a very nice stay and the hotel looks very good inside! its worth a dinner and also a stay. next time if we will fly over Mumbai we ll stay here!
reviews.title: Good hotel for short dinner before flight

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel arriving from Europe and having an inner-Indian flight out of Mumbai the next day. Everything is excellent about this hotel, be it the rooms, the restaurant or the service. We paid around 135€ per night for two adults and a 10-year old kid, breakfast not included. If there is one thing to criticise, then it's that the hotel charges 700 INR for the airport pick-up that only takes a few minutes whereas a pre-paid taxi from airport to the town centre costs only 430 INR !!!
reviews.title: Best choice if you need to stay close to Mumbai Airport

reviews.text: We reached mumbai at midnight. Reached hotel by 1 am. Welcome was ok. Took a bit of time to check in. Otherwise everything was great. The midnight buffet was great. Especially the indian section was good. The rooms were good, clean and neat. Checkout was smooth.
reviews.title: good place to stay.

reviews.text: very close to the international airport!!! they have a shuttle service for a fee. they were on time and friendly. rooms were very clean and well maintained. staff was friendly and attentive. breakfast buffet was very good.
reviews.title: excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel just works-- it's new, clean, quiet despite the noise outside, staffed with attentive employes who go out of their way to see you have what you need. The room was crisp, clean and attractive with modern bedding, quite comfortable and roomy. I'd gladly stay here again.
reviews.title: Fine hotel close to the airport

description: The country’s largest city of Mumbai joins the Hilton Worldwide group by welcoming Hilton Mumbai International Airport. This hotel reflects the style of a 19th century summer palace with European elegance and the ambience of a stately home.Offering 171 guest rooms and suites that are accented with different hues of wood, all guest rooms are designed with the understanding of a need for comfort and convenience.
